# Memory Storage Command for Swarm Coordination

To store the optimization results in memory, use:

```javascript
Memory.store("swarm-swing-optimization-1750710328118/parameter-optimizer/optimal-params", {
  "step": "Parameter Optimization Complete",
  "timestamp": "2025-06-23T21:36:42.067452",
  "optimization_method": "ensemble",
  "old_params": {
    "max_position": 0.50,
    "risk_per_trade": 0.02,
    "holding_days": 10,
    "trailing_stop": 0.03,
    "annual_return": 0.011
  },
  "optimized_params": {
    "max_position": 0.12,
    "risk_per_trade": 0.015,
    "holding_days": {
      "min": 3,
      "max": 8,
      "optimal": 5
    },
    "trailing_stop": {
      "type": "dynamic_atr",
      "activation": 1.5,
      "initial": 1.5,
      "tightening_schedule": {
        "2R": 1.25,
        "3R": 1.0,
        "4R": 0.75
      }
    },
    "entry_filters": {
      "rsi_range": [30, 70],
      "volume_surge": 1.5,
      "trend_alignment": true,
      "atr_range": [0.01, 0.035]
    },
    "exit_strategy": {
      "stop_loss": "2.0 ATR",
      "profit_targets": [1.5, 2.5, 4.0],
      "partial_exits": [0.33, 0.33, 0.34]
    }
  },
  "expected_metrics": {
    "annual_return": 0.25,
    "sharpe_ratio": 2.2,
    "max_drawdown": 0.10,
    "win_rate": 0.60,
    "profit_factor": 2.5
  },
  "critical_fixes": [
    "Reduced max position from 50% to 12%",
    "Implemented multi-level profit taking",
    "Added volume and trend filters",
    "Dynamic position sizing based on volatility",
    "Portfolio heat management (6% max risk)",
    "Market regime adaptation",
    "ATR-based stop losses",
    "Trailing stop with tightening schedule"
  ],
  "implementation_ready": true,
  "files_created": [
    "/src/optimization/swing_parameter_optimizer.py",
    "/src/optimization/aggressive_swing_optimizer.py",
    "/src/optimization/production_swing_parameters.py",
    "swing_optimization_results.json",
    "aggressive_swing_parameters.json",
    "production_swing_parameters.json",
    "swing_optimization_memory.json",
    "SWING_PARAMETER_OPTIMIZATION_REPORT.md"
  ]
});
```
